scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build"
scripts.install: (cd client && npm install) && (cd server && npm install)
scripts.heroku-build: npm install && cd client &&  npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && PORT=3000 npm run start" "cd server && PORT=3001 npm run start"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
